text: Ivor Colin Danvers (14 July 1932 in Westcliff-on-Sea, Essex â€“ 13 March 2020) was a British actor who played Geraid Uruquhart in the BBC drama series Howards' Way. He also guest starred in Minder, Z Cars, Softly, Softly, Terry and June, Tenko and Juliet Bravo. ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British actors
title: Ivor Danvers
